DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Facebook use motivate factor obese overweight adolescent weight-reduction program .
DOC.brief_title: Use Facebook Motivating Factor Weight-reduction Program Obese Overweight Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize control trial . There two randomly assign group obese overweight adolescent ( WHO definition ) . Both group enrol 12 week weight reduction program include personal nutritional evaluation food plan exercise routine . Follow-up appointment hold every 3 week . One group encourage update Facebook status least day , regard healthy lifestyle change ( exercise routine , healthy food choice , `` checking-in '' wellness center , kilograms lose , etc ) . The control group ask share information program Facebook 12 week . Facebook follow-up hold investigator study 's Facebook account . Teenagers thoroughly explain set account limit profile want . At end program group compare regard weight loss mean BMI .
DOC.criteria: Adolescents 13 19 year old . Obese overweight accord IOTF . No physical medical impediment perform physical activity . No risk eat disorder ( SCOFF questionnaire ) . Report less 20 minute physical activity per day . Have active Facebook account use 20 minute per day . Lowrisk Gatehouse Bullying Scale . Physical medical impediment perform physical activity . Answer `` yes '' least twice SCOFF questionnaire . Report 20 minute exercise per day . Not active Facebook account use less 20 minute per day . `` High Risk '' Gatehouse Bullying Scale .
